title: Walken vs. Jon Snow - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 03.27.18
description:
Thanks to Hims for sponsoring this episode. Get a trial month of Hims for just $5 today at http://forhims.com/morningshow

Andy and Nick talk about Fox’s new release dates for Dark Phoenix and New Mutants, Tom Cruise’s newest insane stunt, and George Lucas’ original ending for the new trilogy. Also, the second annual Celebrity Impression Power Hour lovingly entitled, “A Walken the Snow”.

TIME STAMPS -
-20th Century fox shuffles release dates (14:15 mins)
-Tom Cruise leaps from plane at 25,000 feet for mission: impossible stunt (22:20 mins)
-According to Mark Hamill, this as the ending of George Lucas' episode IX (29:40 mins)



Thanks to https://www.twitter.com/kumailh for our timestamps!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.
